| Metric | Value |

| Traditional (Raw Specs) | 1 tokens |

## Analysis

By converting MCP tool definitions into TypeScript wrappers, we achieved a **-9300% reduction** in token usage.

This means:
- Agents can work with 0x more tools in the same context window
- Faster processing and lower API costs
- Cleaner, more maintainable code
